entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
